title: NASA's Chandra telescope uses 'X-arithmetic' to reveal how black holes shape galaxy clusters (images)
description: A novel "X-arithmetic" technique reveals how black holes shape the universe's largest structures.
content: A novel "X-arithmetic" technique reveals how black holes shape the universe's largest structures.
